Santa_Monica.Fleur de Lys (Los Angeles, California):
Fleur de Lys is a mansion in Holmby Hills, Los Angeles, California.


== Overview ==
Situated on five acres of land in Holmby Hills, the 45,000-square-foot (4,200 m2) property has twelve bedrooms, fifteen baths, a fifty-seat theater, a ballroom, a gym, a pool house, a 1,200-foot (370 m) running track, a tennis court and a guest house. There is a 200-yard (180 m) driveway from the gate to the main house.
